strings.packages_description: View and manage your software packages.
strings.confirm_package_update: Are you sure you want to update this package?
strings.confirm_package_reinstall: Are you sure you want to reinstall this package?
strings.confirm_package_uninstall_1: Are you sure you want to uninstall this package?
strings.confirm_package_uninstall_2: This package is a dependency required by other installed packages. If you uninstall this package, those other packages may no longer work properly. Are you sure you want to uninstall this package?

strings.timezone_update_failure: Failed to set server time zone
strings.timezone_get_failure: Failed to get the server time zone

strings.security_update_failure: Failed to set software security preferences
strings.security_get_failure: Failed to get the software security preferences
strings.server_firewall_info: Set IP table packet filtering rules for the server.
strings.firewall_get_failure: Failed to get the software firewall
strings.server_firewall_level_low: Low: protection from port scans and DoS attacks
strings.server_firewall_level_medium: Medium: allow only essential and convenient ports
strings.server_firewall_level_high: High: allow only essential secure ports
strings.server_firewall_type_desc: Under Medium or High security level:
strings.server_firewall_type_none: Allow both mail and web ports
strings.server_firewall_type_mail: Mail Only: allow only mail ports
strings.service_desc_server: The server itself and all processes
strings.service_desc_mailman: Software that manages electronic mailing lists
strings.service_desc_dovecot: Program that controls inbound imap and pop3 over SSL/TLS
strings.service_desc_inetd: Super server that manages Internet services
strings.inetd_desc_ftp: Controls file transfer to and from server
strings.inetd_desc_pop3: Protocol to retrieve email from server
strings.inetd_desc_dovecot: Program that controls inbound imap and pop3 over SSL/TLS
strings.service_manage_monitoring: Review and customize your monitoring preferences.
strings.confirm_service_stop: Are you sure you want to stop this service?
strings.confirm_service_autorestart: (Currently, the monitoring system is configured to automatically restart this service when down.)
strings.confirm_service_restart: Are you sure you want to restart this service?
strings.confirm_service_reboot: If you perform this action, your server will not be accessible for several minutes. Do you still want to perform this action?
strings.confirm_service_restart_httpd: Restarting httpd will take about 10-15 seconds. You will not be able to access your server functions while the restart is taking place. Do you still want to restart?
strings.monitor_notify_events_restarted: Send notifications until service is restarted
strings.monitor_email_settings: Email Settings for Monitoring and Notifications
strings.monitor_email_settings_info: Restart notices and service interruption alerts will be sent to the email address specified below. It is recommended (but not required) that a remote, off-site mail server be used. Provide the SMTP authorization credentials as needed. A test message will be sent to the e-mail address when the settings are saved.
strings.monitor_notify_localhost_warning: If a remote mail server is not specified, then 'localhost' will be used instead. If the sendmail service stops unexpectedly, then monitoring notifications may not be delivered.
strings.monitor_notify_email_server_note: (if left blank, then 'localhost' will be used)
strings.monitor_err_interval_invalid: Monitoring interval is invalid (must be a factor of 60).
strings.monitor_err_nothing_to_monitor: Monitoring has been turned on, but no services or notifications were selected.
strings.monitor_err_max_notify_blank: Must specify a positive numeric value for maximum notifications.
strings.monitor_err_max_notify_invalid: Must specify a positive numeric value for maximum notifications.
strings.monitor_err_email_address_blank: Notification email address must be specified.
strings.monitor_err_auth_username_blank: The SMTP username for the remote mail server is blank.
strings.monitor_err_auth_password_blank: The SMTP password for the remote mail server is blank.
strings.monitor_err_mail_connect_fail: A connection could not be established with the mail server.
strings.monitor_err_mail_auth_fail: The remote mail server authentication credentials are invalid.
strings.monitor_test_message_body:
This is a test of the monitoring system on '__HOSTNAME__'. This is only a test.
The system was developed to keep you informed in the event of a service interruption or a server reboot. If this had been an actual notification, this email message would contain a timely alert and information about services running on this server.
This concludes the test of the monitoring system.
strings.monitor_message_body_reboot: The monitoring system on __HOSTNAME__ has detected that the server has recently rebooted. The server rebooted at __TIME__.
strings.monitor_message_body_service_down: The monitoring system on __HOSTNAME__ has detected that the '__SERVICE__' service is down.
strings.monitor_message_body_auto_restart: The monitoring system has automatically restarted the service. The service is running again.
strings.monitor_message_body_auto_restart_fail: The monitoring system has attempted to automatically restart the service. The attempt has failed; manual intervention is required.
strings.monitor_message_body_manual_restart: The service will need to be manually restarted.
strings.monitor_message_body_alert_unlimited: These alerts will continue until the service is running again.
strings.admin_shell_ssh1_disabled: This tool is no longer supported as it requires an outdated and insecure ssh protocol.

missing_java_support.b: Your Browser seems to have no Java support. Please get a new browser or enable Java to see this applet!

strings.admin_log_select_domain: View and manage Apache log files for:

strings.log_list_failure: Failed to load the logs list.
strings.log_action_archive_confirm: After the log has been archived, httpd must be restarted. Restarting httpd will take about 10-15 seonds. You will not be able to access your server functions while the restart is taking place. Do you still want to archive now?
strings.log_not_exist: Logs do not exists for this domain.
strings.admin_arc_log_select_domain: View and manage Archived Apache log files for:
strings.confirm_archive_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this archive?
strings.confirm_archives_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected archives?
strings.archive_item_select_prompt: Please select one or more archives
strings.log_archive_delete_failure: Failed to delete one or more of the log archive(s).
strings.log_archive_list_failure: Failed to load the log archive list.
strings.task_list_description: Edit scheduled tasks and their descriptions.
strings.task_output_description:
Scheduled tasks run without any intervention. If a task generates text output (e.g., in the case of an error),
that text can be sent via email to the owner ("user") of that task, another email address, or discarded.
strings.task_output_user: Send task messages to the respective task owner.
strings.task_output_other: Send all task messages to (a username or email address):
strings.tasks_item_select_prompt: Please select one or more tasks
strings.confirm_tasks_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected task(s)?
strings.confirm_tasks_disable: Are you sure you want to disable the selected task(s)?
strings.confirm_task_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
strings.confirm_task_disable: Are you sure you want to disable this task?
strings.task_delete_failure: Failed to delete the requested task.
strings.task_enable_failure: Failed to enable the requested task.
strings.task_disable_failure: Failed to disable the requested task.
strings.task_group_delete_failure: Failed to delete one or more of the selected task(s).
strings.task_group_enable_failure: Failed to enable one or more of the selected task(s).
strings.task_group_disable_failure: Failed to disable one or more of the selected task(s).
strings.task_mailto_change_failure: Failed to change the MAIL-TO address. Delivery address must be a valid email address or a valid local username.
strings.task_mailto_error_email_req: An Email Address name is required.
strings.schedule_select_choices: Select from choices below. Not required.
strings.podcast_list_description:
Use the following procedure to create a Podcast:

Step 1: Create a podcast channel.
Step 2: Add a podcast episode to the podcast channel.
Step 3: Copy and paste the RSS feed (podcast channel link) into your homepage.

Description:
This is a list of all of your podcast channels. To view some of the important details about your channels and the existing episodes please click on the expand symbol in the left column.

If you need to create a channel, please click on the "Create a New Channel" button below.
strings.podcast_list_feedempty: Currently, there are no channels defined.
strings.podcast_task_alert_setimage: iTunes supports images in JPEG and PNG formats, url must end in .jpg or .png
strings.podcast_task_alert_setcat: Please select three or fewer categories.
strings.podcast_task_confirm_addfeed: Title, Domain, Directory, File Name, Website URL and Description are required
strings.podcast_task_confirm_additem: Title, File URL and Description are required
strings.podcast_task_confirm_delfeed: Are you sure you want to delete the selected channel?
strings.podcast_task_confirm_delitem: Are you sure you want to delete the selected episode?
strings.podcast_task_success_upfile: Successfully uploaded file to the current directory.
strings.podcast_task_failure_addfeed: Failed to create the new channel.
strings.podcast_task_failure_additem: Failed to create the new episode.
strings.podcast_task_failure_delfeed: Failed to delete the selected channel.
strings.podcast_task_failure_delitem: Failed to delete the selected episode.
strings.podcast_task_failure_editfeed: Failed to change the selected channel.
strings.podcast_task_failure_edititem: Failed to change the selected episode.
strings.podcast_task_failure_pubfeed: Failed to publish the selected channel.
strings.podcast_task_failure_upfile: Failed to upload file to the current directory.
strings.podcast_feed_add_category_format: Hold down 'ctrl' key for multiple selections
strings.podcast_feed_add_description_add:
In order to create a Podcast you must first Create a Channel and then fill it with episodes. Please fill in the required fields below and click
the "Save" button. If you would like to add more than one channel please click the "Save / Add Another" button. If you wish to cancel please
click the "Cancel" button.
* Required Fields
strings.podcast_feed_add_description_edit:
Edit or add any information to the following fields then click the "Save" button at the bottom of the page. Clicking the "Cancel" button will exit
the editing process and revert back to the original xml.
* Required Fields
strings.podcast_item_add_category_format: Hold down 'ctrl' key for multiple selections
strings.podcast_item_add_description_add:
To add an episode fill in the fields below and click the "Save" button. You will then be taken back to the Channel List page.
If you would like to add more than one episode please click the "Save / Add Another" button. Your first episode will be saved and the fields will reset so that you may enter another episode right away without being taken back to the Channel List. You may do this as many times as required.
Clicking the "Cancel" button at any time in the process will take you back to the Channel List without saving your episode.
* Required Fields
strings.podcast_item_add_description_edit:
Manage your episode item tags in the fields below. Make any edits, additions and / or deletions below and click the "Save" button in order to
save your changes. You will be taken back to the Channel List. Clicking the "Cancel" button at any time will exit the editing process without saving
the changes.
* Required Fields
strings.bc_podcast_item_select: Choose Episode to Add to Channel
strings.podcast_item_select_title: Choose Episode to Add to Channel
strings.podcast_item_select_description:
Instructions: Select the file you want to add to your podcast channel from the list below. To change the directory, select the directory from the "Contents of: Directory" drop-down list. If you want to upload a file to the current directory, click the "Browse" button and search for the file on your local computer. When you find the file, click the "Upload" button. The "Choose Episode to Add to Channel" window refreshes, displaying the file in the listing of .Contents of: Directory..

After clicking the "Upload" button, you must be patient. Depending upon the size of the file, it might take several minutes before the file is uploaded.

Note: The combined file upload size cannot exceed a maximum of 10 MB. To upload files larger than 10 MB, use an FTP program of your choice.
